title: Glen & Tyler's Honeymoon Adventure
description: Tyler can't inherit unless he gets married ... and when Glen proposes, hijinks ensue. Follow the guys on their world-spanning adventure as they defeat mobsters, an evil step-mother, a rakish brother-in-law and pirates. No, really -- pirates! Plus there's an underground super-base. And hockey. Come for the romance, stay for the hockey.
author: J.B. Sanders
